name: ECE3140 / CS3420 Final Project Page
body:
### Welcome to ECE3140 / CS 3420 GitHub Pages!

The repo is set up so you can easily edit the page using the online Markdown editor from GitHub. In order to access it 

* Go to "settings" in the repo
* Scroll down to the section with GitHub pages
* Press the "Launch Automatic Page Generator"

That should allow you to update (and remove) this text.

You are also welcome to use any other method to update/generate your course page. In order to update the material, push to the "gh-page" branch. Also note, that while the repo is private the **page content is public**. 

### "Web Check In"

Please remove this page and write a short paragraph on your progress to date and make a draft for the System Overview Section. Are there any major obstacles?

You can also start putting in the structure for the final page, but we will only be looking at the System Overview for now. Your project page should have the following sections (which are similar to the lab reports).

* A Descriptive Project Name 
* Introduction
* System Overview <--- Draft for Web Check In  
* Project Video Demo (~3-4min)
* Detailed Technical Description
* Additional Resources Used 
* Work Distribution (skip if you work by yourself)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
